snippet: The African nation is frequently attacked by the Islamist militants of the Boko Haram group, which has declared its allegiance to the Islamic State group.
abstract: Chad authorities suspect Boko Haram is behind triple suicide bombing which killed 15 people at market on island in Lake Chad; Nigerian extremist group has frequently targeted lake region which touches borders of Chad, Cameroon, Nigeria and Niger.
lead_paragraph: The African nation is frequently attacked by the Islamist militants of the Boko Haram group, which has declared its allegiance to the Islamic State group.

headline.main: Chad Suspects Boko Haram in Island Attacks
headline.print_headline: Chad Suspects Boko Haram in Island Attacks
